CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We report the synthesis , characterization , and solar cell properties of new donor - acceptor - type low band gap polymers ( POBDTPD and PEBDTPD ) that incorporate dialkoxybenzodithiophene ( BDT ) as the donor and N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]pentalene-4,6-dione ( DTPD ) as the acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| POBDTPD |
| PEBDTPD |
| dialkoxybenzodithiophene (BDT) |
| N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]pentalene-4,6-dione (DTPD) |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be considered as material names, as they refer to specific chemical compounds mentioned in the paragraph.

Paragraph: We report the synthesis , characterization , and solar cell properties of new donor - acceptor - type low band gap polymers ( POBDTPD and PEBDTPD ) that incorporate dialkoxybenzodithiophene ( BDT ) as the donor and N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]pentalene-4,6-dione ( DTPD ) as the acceptor.

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material properties. "Synthesis" and "characterization" are processes used to obtain and analyze the material, while "dialkoxybenzodithiophene (BDT)" and "N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]pentalene-4,6-dione (DTPD)" are the specific donor and acceptor materials used in the synthesis of the polymers.
